title: Spotting winners of the coming tech shakedown - Mint
content: Spotting winners of the coming tech shakedown  Mint
description: Shares of some internet companies are down between 49% and 63% from their 52-week highs.Some analysts see the recent correction in tech stocks as an opportunity to buy growth stocks at reasonable valuations. ‘Innovation is on sale,’ US-based fund manager Cathie Wood said
